name: A Oi Apartment
address: Level 2, Alley 28 Hai Ba Trung Street Hoan Kiem District, Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Set in Hanoi, this air-conditioned apartment features free WiFi and a balcony. The unit is a few steps from Trang Tien Plaza.

There is a seating area and a kitchen. A flat-screen TV is provided. Other facilities at A Oi Apartment include a terrace.

Ba Dinh Square is 200 metres from A Oi Apartment, while Hoan Kiem Lake is 500 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 22 km from A Oi Apartment.
